/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, leading the viewer's eye towards the mountains that loom in the background. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings and road. The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of city life and nature in Beijing.
